generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible tire marks and road markings, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, delineated by poles and curbs, which are typical of sidewalks.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including commercial establishments with signage.
- vegetation: Trees with leaves are visible along the street, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- person: A person wearing a blue jacket is visible walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
- car: Two cars are parked on the side of the road, one silver BMW and one black car.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a red border and a white "T" is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, used to delineate the pedestrian area.
- fence: A fence made of metal bars is visible along the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
